effect.sword_shield: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the_crown_tundra: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.legends_arceus: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.sword_shield: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.legends_arceus: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
